ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Two
ComicInfo.Summary: The second issue of the hottest new series of 2012 is here! In modern times, Nicholas Lash searches for answers about the mysterious woman who ruined his life, while in the mid-1950s, reporter Dominic Raines is drawn down that same murderous path... The award-winning team of Brubaker and Phillips keeps the heat on high in this epic horror noir.
ComicInfo.Characters: Nicolas Lash,Dominic Hank Raines,Bishop,Sylvia Raines,Josephine,Walter Booker
